ValidationRule.description: Supported Product, Catalog Product Group, and Product Type are mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$RecordType.DeveloperName =='Technical_Issue' && ( ISpickval( Supported_Product__c ,'') || ISpickval( Catalog_Product_Group__c ,'') || ISpickval( Product_Type__c ,'') )
&& (or (ispickval (Status,'Approved'),ispickval (Status,'Tech Issue-SR Assigned'),ispickval (Status,'Closed/Collected'),ispickval (Status,'Expired'),ispickval (Status,'Done'),ispickval (Status,'Closed with Credit'),ispickval (Status,'Completed'),ispickval (Status,'Partially Accepted'),ispickval (Status,'Denied')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Supported Product, Catalog Product Group, and Product Type are mandatory
